info.name: DNS SaaS Service Detection
author: noah @thesubtlety
pdteam
info.description: A CNAME DNS record was discovered

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 48806
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.cohesion-territoires.gouv.fr.	IN	 CNAME
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 48806
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.cohesion-territoires.gouv.fr.	IN	 CNAME

;; ANSWER SECTION:
www.cohesion-territoires.gouv.fr.	300	IN	CNAME	vip04.sen-proxy.medde.ate.info.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.cohesion-territoires.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently Connection: close Content-Length: 162 Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 29 Oct 2023 01:52:59 GMT Location: https://www.ecologie.gouv.fr/ Server: nginx 301 Moved Permanently

info.name: PHPinfo Page - Detect

daffainfo
meme-lord
dhiyaneshdk
wabafet
info.description: PHPinfo page was detected. The output of the phpinfo() command can reveal sensitive and detailed PHP environment information.
info.remediation: Remove PHP Info pages from publicly accessible sites, or restrict access to authorized users only.

request:

info.name: Missing Subresource Integrity
author: lucky0x0d
pulsesecurity.co.nz
info.description: Checks if script tags within the HTML response have Subresource Integrity implemented via the integrity attribute

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.cohesion-territoires.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept-Encoding: gzip

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.cohesion-territoires.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently Connection: close Content-Length: 162 Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 29 Oct 2023 01:53:51 GMT Location: https://www.ecologie.gouv.fr/ Server: nginx 301 Moved Permanently

301 Moved Permanently

nginx
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: www.cohesion-territoires.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://www.cohesion-territoires.gouv.fr/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
